comment._content: I think this must be the American lightweight boxer Joe Mandot (1891-1956), aka the New Orleans Baker Boy, who was active in the ring from 1909 to 1921. Among his many ring opponents (he fought more than 100 bouts) were Joe Rivers and Joe Thiel, both of whom are depicted in other Bain photos posted today. Another boxer named Joe Mandot was a featherweight born in Mexico who had about two dozen bouts in Southern California, from 1922 to 1928, but given the time frame of photos in this collection, I'd say he's not likely to be the boxer depicted in this photo. BoxRec's website is down this evening, so I can't check for more details of his career right now, but Here's a link to "Baker Boy" Joe Mandot's bout list there for when the site starts working again.
